name: Rapis The Bullet
description:
Ricochet bullets back and take your chances!
Close combat shooting without shooting bullets

The player has only a sword and cannot shoot bullets.
Moreover, the boss has deployed a shield, so even if you slash directly at him, you will not take damage. ......

So take advantage of the boss's attacks!
Aim at the special bullets and swing your sword to bounce them back.

If you hit the shield with a ricocheting bullet, it will explode! Destroy the shield and create a chance to attack directly!

Furthermore, ricocheting bullets can absorb enemy bullets.
If you guide them to absorb more enemy bullets, they will cause a powerful explosion and you will be able to cut down many shields at once!

Aim to destroy all 5 bosses and clear the game.
